unnormalised: Edu-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals - Your Ticket to IIT dreams!
normalised: Edu-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals - Your Ticket to I I T dreams!

unnormalised: Forget endlessly scrolling through notices pinned on Amity University's notice board! Scholarship portals are the new guru mantra for funding your education. Think of them as matchmaking apps, but for students and scholarships. Need Rs. 50,000 for that coding bootcamp in Bangalore? There’s probably a scholarship waiting.
normalised: Forget endlessly scrolling through notices pinned on Amity University's notice board! Scholarship portals are the new guru mantra for funding your education. Think of them as matchmaking apps, but for students and scholarships. Need rupee fifty thousand for that coding bootcamp in Bangalore? There's probably a scholarship waiting.

unnormalised: These platforms like Buddy4Study and Vidya Lakshmi, are becoming super popular, connecting students from remote villages in UP to global opportunities. Gone are the days of relying solely on Uncle Sharma’s "connections."
normalised: These platforms like Buddy four Study and Vidya Lakshmi, are becoming super popular, connecting students from remote villages in U P to global opportunities. Gone are the days of relying solely on Uncle Sharma's "connections."

unnormalised: Many offer personalized recommendations based on your academic record and family income. Applying is often easier than making chai - just create a profile, upload documents, and voila!
normalised: Many offer personalized recommendations based on your academic record and family income. Applying is often easier than making chai - just create a profile, upload documents, and voila!

unnormalised: Deadline approaching? Most portals send reminders so you don't miss out! Check them out before 30/09/2024. New scholarships drop all the time - keep an eye out at 17:00 hrs daily!
normalised: Deadline approaching? Most portals send reminders so you don't miss out! Check them out before thirtieth september two thousand and twenty four. New scholarships drop all the time - keep an eye out at five P M daily!

unnormalised: Bonus tip: Some even have quizzes & contests to win scholarships – a true "Sone Pe Suhaga" moment! Get started before 10 AM on 15/08/2024 for exclusive early bird offers!
normalised: Bonus tip: Some even have quizzes and contests to win scholarships – a true "Sone Pe Suhaga" moment! Get started before ten A M on fifteenth august two thousand and twenty four for exclusive early bird offers!
